section.title: Abandoned Carts & Lost Sales Cost UAE Retailers
section.description: Every missed customer inquiry could be a lost sale or negative review. See how Sawtic AI transforms e-commerce communication challenges into competitive advantages.

problems.title: High Cart Abandonment Rates
problems.description: Customers abandon shopping carts when they can't get immediate answers about shipping, returns, or product details. Without real-time support, they shop with competitors instead.

problems.title: Overwhelmed Customer Service
problems.description: Customer service teams can't handle peak shopping periods during sales events and holidays. Long wait times frustrate customers and damage brand reputation.
problems.impact: 60% of calls during peak hours go unanswered

problems.title: After-Hours Shopping Support
problems.description: Online shoppers browse and buy at all hours, especially during evening and weekend peak times. Without 24/7 support, businesses lose international and late-night customers.
problems.impact: 40% of online traffic happens after business hours

problems.title: Complex Product Information
problems.description: Customers need detailed product specs, compatibility info, and sizing guidance. Without expert assistance, they either buy wrong items or don't buy at all.
problems.impact: 30% of returns due to product mismatch

problems.title: Order Tracking & Support Issues
problems.description: Customers constantly check order status, delivery updates, and need help with changes or cancellations. Manual processes slow down resolution and frustrate customers.

problems.title: Language Barriers with Expat Shoppers
problems.description: UAE's international community shops online in multiple languages. Language barriers prevent sales and create customer service complications.
problems.impact: 35% of UAE online shoppers prefer non-English support

solutions.title: 24/7 Cart Recovery Assistant
solutions.description: AI agent proactively contacts customers with abandoned carts, answers questions, offers assistance, and guides them through checkout completion.

solutions.title: Intelligent Product Consultation
solutions.description: Smart product recommendation system with detailed specs, compatibility checks, and personalized suggestions based on customer needs and preferences.

solutions.title: Instant Order Management
solutions.description: Real-time order tracking, modification support, and delivery coordination. Customers get immediate updates and can make changes without waiting.

solutions.title: Peak Season Support Scaling
solutions.description: AI automatically handles increased volume during sales events, holidays, and peak shopping periods without hiring temporary staff.

solutions.title: Multilingual Shopping Assistant
solutions.description: Fluent support in Arabic, English, Hindi, and Urdu for UAE's diverse online shopping community with cultural shopping preferences.

solutions.title: Smart Returns & Exchanges
solutions.description: Automated returns processing, exchange coordination, and refund management with instant policy explanations and resolution tracking.
